It works well with the`Zipline`_ open source backtesting library.At the core of pyfolio is a so-called tear sheet that consists ofvarious individual plots that provide a comprehensive performanceoverview of a portfolio... _Quantopian Inc: https://www.quantopian.com.. _Zipline: http://zipline.io
